title: How to Control the Human Ego - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/21/17
itunes:title: How to Control the Human Ego - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/21/17
description:
George Noory and religion expert Martin Ball discuss the efforts of world religions to control the human ego to gain enlightenment about God and the nature of reality.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
